MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 1:08 pm in the LL16 postcode area of Bodfari to repair faulty equipment on the overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:41 pm on 25th February, 2021.
